Data Structures | Macros
Random
Stratify OS » Device Interface

Detailed Description

This is the interface for accessing random number generator devices.

Data Structures

struct  random_info_t
 Random info. More...
 
struct  random_attr_t
 Random attributes. More...
 

Macros

#define I_RANDOM_GETINFO
 
#define I_RANDOM_SETATTR
 

Macro Definition Documentation

#define I_RANDOM_GETINFO

This request reads the radio attributes.

Example:

1 random_info_t info;
2 ioctl(fildes, I_RANDOM_GETINFO, &info);
#define I_RANDOM_SETATTR

This request sets the radio attributes.

Example:

1 random_attr_t attr;
2 attr.o_flags = RANDOM_FLAG_SET_SEED;
3 attr.seed = 10;
4 ioctl(fildes, I_RANDOM_SETATTR, &attr);
